name: Roger's Cheesy Pub Crawl
description:
After finishing his cricket game, Roger and his other pals Roger go to the Cluny bar for their regular intake of cheese. Unfortunately the other team  has the same idea which makes everyone fuming. 

It's now your job to serve everyone their cheeses to meet their needs, and ensure everyone's safety.

------------------------------------------------ // -------------------------------------------

Controls:

WASD: Movement

E: Pick Up Cheese from the Bar / Hand over held cheese to customer / Play the Jukebox

Mouse 1: Click the customers to check their needs.

------------------------------------------------ // -------------------------------------------

Every cheese meets a different need, so make sure you give everyone the correct cheese or else their happiness will decrease.

If they're unhappy, they have a chance to be angry and start lobbing random items to opposite team members.

If the bar gets out of control, use the jukebox to increase everyone's mood. It does have a 60s cooldown.

Thank you for playing our game!

- Long Neck Fellas

Luis Venceslau - Design + Art
